title: Role of the House and Senate in a bicameral system

content.question:
The framers of the United States Constitution created a legislative system that is bicameral. However, it is not just bicameral; the framers also established two houses of distinctly different character and authority.
(a) Discuss two reasons why the framers created a bicameral legislature.
(b) Identify one power unique to the House of Representatives and explain why
the framers gave the House that power.
(c) Identify one power unique to the Senate and explain why the framers gave
the Senate that power.
